news.title: Schindler expects new installations in China to decline by 10% in 2024
news.para: Although Chinese installations outpaced the rest of Asia-Pacific in both units and value in the first quarter, Schindler said weakness in the country's construction activity would likely weigh on future orders.

news.title: Home building permits in Germany drop by 18% in February 2024
news.para: Germany has been jolted by the most severe slump in the property sector in decades, Some 18,200 permits were issued, which is 4,100 fewer than a year earlier, the data showed, as the slump enters its third year.

news.title: China needs to solve real estate crisis as soon as possible: IMF chief
news.para: Gaspar said China's debt was increasing by about two percentage points of gross domestic product each year, but Chinese authorities had enough policy space and options to control deficits and debt.

news.title: Spain’s Santander to exit mortgage business & cut 500 jobs in Germany by 2026
news.para: After years of boom, mortgage lending slowed sharply in Germany after a rapid rise in interest rates to stamp out inflation caused potential homeowners to stay on the sidelines. Recent data have shown a stabilisation of the market.

news.title: Spain’s ACS expects net profit to reach upto $1.06 billion by 2026
news.para: ACS told investors on Wednesday during a capital markets day that its net profit should reach between 850 million and 1 billion euros ($905 million-$1.06 billion) by 2026, while it forecast revenues of 43 billion-48 billion euros by then.

news.title: Global economy set to lose $38 trillion every year till 2050 amid climate change: Study
news.para: Maximilian Kotz, a PIK scientist, said, "Our study finds that the global economy is committed to an average income loss of 19 per cent by 2049 due to past emissions. This corresponds to a 17 per cent reduction in global GDP."

news.title: Altum Credo raises US$ 40 million in series C equity funding round
news.para: Z3Partners and Oikocredit led the round with participation from British International Investment and existing investors Aavishkaar Capital, Amicus Capital and PS Pai & family.

news.title: EOW arrests trustee for cheating developer in redevelopment scam in Mumbai
news.para: Complainant Javed Hussain who runs Reliable Investment and Developers spent Rs 15 crore to settle existing tenants based on agreement with the trustee.

news.title: Consumer forum orders Kajaria Ceramics to compensate customer for selling defective tiles
news.para: If they pay later, it will be with 8% annual interest. The complainant is in the optician’s trade and he had engaged the authorised distributor of Kajaria Ceramics to check out tiles to replace the floor of his shop.

news.title: SC asks NCDRC why non-bailable warrant issued against Ireo Grace Realtech directors
news.para: The top court had on March 1 granted protection to them against any coercive action but the commission proceeded to issue non-bailable warrant against the directors of the firm Ireo Grace Realtech Pvt Ltd on April 2.

news.title: DLF Urban gets ITAT relief in Rs 328 crore dispute
news.para: Delhi ITAT grants DLF Urban relief, rejecting ₹328 crore addition. Property valued via Cushman and Wakefield for Moti Nagar land development rights. TPO's adjustment upheld by Commissioner regarding transfer pricing.

news.title: Rising heat makes water a key selling point for Indian builders
news.para: Large property developers in India are incorporating water conservation measures into their projects to mitigate environmental impact and address the challenges of water stress and the looming summer heatwave.

news.title: Indiabulls Housing Finance seeks review of SC’s order on ED's powers
news.para: Indiabulls Housing Finance has requested a review of the Supreme Court's February order, which allegedly expanded the Enforcement Directorate's powers beyond the PMLA law's mandate and conflicted with the Vijay Madanlal Choudhary vs Un-ion of India case.

news.title: Quess Corp MD buys 10,000 sq ft plot for Rs 67.5 crore in Bengaluru
news.para: At ₹70,300 per sq ft, the deal set a new benchmark for the property market in the country's technology hub. "The deal was closed last week, and the property belonged to Arvind Reddy and Geeta Reddy.

news.title: Adani infuses Rs 8,339 crore more in Ambuja Cements, raises stake to 70.3%
news.para: ​The Adani family previously invested Rs 5,000 crore in the company on October 18, 2022, and Rs 6,661 crore on March 28, 2024. With the latest investment, it has completed Rs 20,000 crore planned infusion, the company said in a statement.

news.title: Single family housing starts in USA drops by 12.4% in March 2024
news.para: The report from the Commerce Department on Tuesday also showed permits for future construction of single-family houses fell to a five-month low.

news.title: Home prices in UK drop by 0.2% in February 2024
news.para: The ONS also said its gauge of private rents rose by 9.2% in the year to March - the biggest increase since records started in 2015 and up from 9.0% in the 12 months to February.

news.title: China's Zhengzhou city tells state-owned company to buy second-hand homes
news.para: Local state state-owned company Zhengzhou Urban Development Group Co. will buy 500 second-hand homes from April 20 to June 30, according to a notice released by the Zhengzhou Real Estate Association on Monday.

news.title: Over 46% office space leases in India by offshoring industry: Report
news.para: India's offshoring market dominates office space leasing, comprising 46% of total leasing in 2023, led by global capability centers (GCCs).

news.title: Delhi Court dismisses default bail plea of Unitech’s ex-promoters in ED's case
news.para: The Patiala House Court of Delhi has dismissed a default bail plea of Unitech's former promoters Sanjay Chandra and Ajay Chandra in connection with a money laundering case registered by the Enforcement Directorate (ED).
